wikipedia_page.main: Rosalee Mason (born 24 April 1979, in London) is a basketball player for England women's national basketball team. She was capped for England over 65 times, has played all over the world and is now a coach. In the 2012 Olympic Games, Mason was one of those selected to carry the Olympic Torch.

response: In the game for the bronze medal, England outscored Nigeria for the first three quarters, but was forced to withstand a sickening comeback when Nigeria shot 29 points to England's 23 in the last quarter.  The top scorer for England was Andrea Congreaves with 21 points, Shelly Boston scored 14 and Rosalee Mason with 12 points.
